QuestData.Title: All that Rises
QuestData.Description: <The voice of the ancient presses against your mind.>$B$BNOW THAT... YOU HAVE STOLEN... THE ENERGIES OF... THE FAITHFUL, ENTER... THE TEMPLE AND... DESTROY... HALLAZEAL THE ASCENDED!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Use the possessed torrent to slay this thing and put an end to the Ascended in Vashj'ir!
QuestData.RewardText: YOU HAVE DONE... MYSELF AND... THE TIDEHUNTER GREAT... SERVICE.
